entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
